attributes.action: Parents Wanting To Photograph Or Film Their Kids At School Events
attributes.additional_details:
http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/15364 is a petition wanting clear guidelines.

Why should I ask for guildlines on wanting to create and save memories of my child just because someone somewhere tells me I can't for the safety of my child.  Is that not my job as a parent?

This 'country' is going too far and we have to draw the line somewhere and its here!

I, and those signing this petition are not asking for a right, we're saying it is our right to collect memories of an electronic or any other kind and those who abuse that right should be punished for the abuse severely.  Its not for me to suffer, its for those who irresponcible, and not in Community service or months in prision, it should be a year in Solitary Confinment for every minute of film from start to finish for every film.
